DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effectiveness fluoride varnish prevention dental caries lesion erupt permanent first molar , high-risk patient . Using reference ICDAS criterion , success mean surface maintain ICDAS value 0 failure change ICDAS value 0 1 . Sample : The sample comprise 180 patient 6-7 year old high-risk dental caries . Study design : It propose experimental design randomize 3 group accord frequency topical fluoride application . ( Group A : every 6 month ; Group B : every 3 month ; Group C : positive control ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Dental Caries Lesions With Fluoride Varnish Erupting First Permanent Molars
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent parent . Child assent High risk dental caries At least one sound first permanent molar ( ICDAS=0 ) Bad behaviour Any systemic condition , disability
